definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be dark (dull-coloured, cf. Ar. qad-i/ura be dirty (on d- = [[ד]] v. Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 729); NH Hiph. (of face) shew gloom; Targum:J [[קְדַר]] be dark);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[וְקָדַר]] Mic 3:6; 1 S. [[קָדַרְתִּי]] Je 8:21, etc.; Pt. [[קׂדֵר]] Ps 35:14 +; pl. [[קׂדְרִים]] Job 5:11, Job 6:16;—be dark, of sky Je 4:28 (leaden-coloured, as with clouds, v. Hithp.), of sun and moon Jn 2:10, Jn 4:15; fig. of lack of revelation from ´[[י]]:, [[עֲלֵיהֶם הַיּוֹם]] ´[[וְק]]: Mic 3:6; of turbid stream Job 6:16; fig. of mourning (prob. be squalid, of neglected person and dress of mourner, cf. 2Sa 19:25) Je 8:21, Je 14:2 ([[לָאָרֶץ]], metaph. of gates); Job 5:11, Job 30:28 ([[בְּלׂא חַמָּה]]), Ps 35:14, Ps 38:7, Ps 42:10, Ps 43:2.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: darken: Pf. 1 S. consec. [[וְהִקְדַּרְתִּי]] Ez Eze 32:7 (obj. stars), cf. Impf. 1 S. sf. [[אַקְדִּירֵם עָלֶיךָ]] Eze 32:8.
cause to mourn [[וׇאַקְדִּר עָלָיו לְבָנוֹן]] Eze 31:15.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְהַשָּׁמַיִם הִתְקַדְּרוּ עָבִים]] 1Ki 18:45 and the heavens grew dark with clouds.
